data_table.description: CPSQ (Comprehensive Pain and Symptom Questionnaire) - The dataset provides 1) data of facial pain assessments, including duration, intensity, location, possible interference with participants' daily activities, GCPS (Graded Chronic Pain Scale) score (for facial and non-facial pain); 2) data of non-facial pain, and 3) queries for presence of comorbidities (n=20, including arthritis, fibromyalgia, ear ringing, IBS, depression, insomnia, heart racing, sleep apnea, etc.).

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: De-identified Subject ID

variable.name: CPSQ_EVERHADPAININFACE
variable.description: CPSQ 2. Have ever had pain in the face etc

variable.name: CPSQ_DURATIONFACIALPAIN
variable.description: Q3 Pattern of facial pain

variable.name: CPSQ_VISITFORFACIALPAIN
variable.description: Q4 seen health care provider for facial pain

variable.name: CPSQ_MOSTRECENTVISIT
variable.description: Most recent visit for facial pain

variable.name: CPSQ_LT50PCTPST6MTHS
variable.description: CPSQ 12a. In past 6 months, number of days efficiency dropped below 50% of what consider normal because of facial pain

variable.name: CPSQ_ORTHODONTIC
variable.description: CPSQ Q35: Ever had orthodontic procedures

variable.name: CPSQ_HEADACHESPASTYR
variable.description: CQSQ Q36: Any headaches in last yr

variable.name: CPSQ_NTYPESHEADACHE
variable.description: CPSQ Q38: # of different types of headache in last yr.

variable.name: CPSQ_PAINOTHERTHANFACE
variable.description: CPQS Q42. Chronic pain other than face

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVEJOINTDISEASE
variable.description: CPSQ Q50a. Have joint disease, arthritis

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVEFIBROMYALGIA
variable.description: CPSQ Q50b. Have fibromyalgia

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVECHRONICFATIGUE
variable.description: CPSQ Q50c. Have chronic fatigue syndrome

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVEIRRITABLEBOWEL
variable.description: CPSQ Q50d. Have irritable bowel syndrome

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVETENDENCYTOFAINT
variable.description: CPSQ Q50e. Have a tendency to faint

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVERINGINGINEARS
variable.description: CPSQ Q50f. Have ringing in ears

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVEHEARTRACING
variable.description: CPSQ Q50g. Have periodic heart racing or pounding

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVETROUBLEWITHNECK
variable.description: CPSQ Q50h. Have repeated trouble with neck, back, or spine

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVEINSOMNIA
variable.description: CPSQ Q50i. Have insomnia

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVEDEPRESSION
variable.description: CPSQ Q50j. Have depression

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVEPANICDISORDER
variable.description: CPSQ Q50k. Have panic disorder

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVEPTS
variable.description: CPSQ Q50l. Have post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD)

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVEANXIETYDISORDER
variable.description: CPSQ Q50m. Have anxiety disorder

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVEACIDREFLUX
variable.description: CPSQ Q50n. Have acid reflux

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVEIC
variable.description: CPSQ Q50o. Have interstitial cystitis

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVEPROSTATITIS
variable.description: CPSQ Q50p. Have prostatitis

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVEMCS
variable.description: CPSQ Q50q. Have multiple chemical sensitivity

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVEDYSMENORRHEA
variable.description: CPSQ Q50r. Have dysmenorrhea

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVECPP
variable.description: CPSQ Q50s. Have chronic pelvic pain

variable.name: CPSQ_HAVESLEEPAPNEA
variable.description: CPSQ Q50t. Have sleep apnea

variable.name: CPSQ_LOWBACKPAIN
variable.description: CPSQ Q51: Have you ever experienced pain in your lower back

variable.name: CPSQ_LOWBACKPAINCURRENT
variable.description: CPSQ Q51a: Current low back pain

variable.name: CPSQ_LPBNUMPST12MTHS
variable.description: CPSQ Q51c: Episodes of low back pain in last year

variable.name: CPSQ_LPBLENGTHEPISODE
variable.description: CPSQ Q51d: How long does average episode of low back pain last
variable.value: More than 7 days of continuous pain

variable.name: Q1COUNT
variable.description: CPSQ Q1: # of non-specific face/jaw symptoms

variable.name: Q2DURATION
variable.description: Q2: Time since facial pain began|(yrs)

variable.name: FACIALPAINCPI_ALL
variable.description: CPSQ: Facial char. pain intensity (all people)

variable.name: FACIALPAININTERF_ALL
variable.description: CPSQ: Facial pain interference (all people)

variable.name: FACIALGCPS_ALL
variable.description: CPSQ: Facial GCPS (all people)

variable.name: FACIALPAINCPI_Q2YES
variable.description: CPSQ: Facial char. pain intensity (+ve pain Hx)

variable.name: FACIALPAININTERF_Q2YES
variable.description: CPSQ: Facial pain interference (+ve pain Hx)

variable.name: FACIALGCPS_Q2YES
variable.description: CPSQ: Facial GCPS (+ve pain Hx)

variable.name: OTHERPAINCPI_ALL
variable.description: Non-facial char. pain intensity (all people)

variable.name: OTHERPAININTERF_ALL
variable.description: Non-facial pain interference (all people)

variable.name: OTHERGCPS_ALL
variable.description: Non-facial GCPS (all people)

variable.name: OTHERPAINCPI_Q2YES
variable.description: Non-facial char. pain intensity (+ve pain Hx)

variable.name: OTHERPAININTERF_Q2YES
variable.description: Non-facial pain interference (+ve pain Hx)

variable.name: OTHERGCPS_Q2YES
variable.description: Non-facial GCPS (+ pain Hx)

variable.name: Q8MODIFIERS
variable.description: CPSQ Q8. No. of activities that modified facial pain last month

variable.name: CPSQTMJNOISES1
variable.description: CPSQ: TMJ noises in last month

variable.name: CPSQTMJNOISEPAIN
variable.description: CPSQ: Pain with TMJ noises in last month

variable.name: CPSQTMJNOISES2
variable.description: CPSQ: TMJ noises before last month

variable.name: CPSQQ33INJURY
variable.description: CPSQ: Lifetime Hx of external injury to jaw

variable.name: CPSQQ34YAWN
variable.description: CPSQ: Jaw injury due to yawning

variable.name: CPSQQ34PROLONGED
variable.description: CPSQ: Jaw injury due to prolonged opening

variable.name: Q50COMORBIDITIES
variable.description: CPSQ: Count of 20 comorbidities

variable.name: IBSROME
variable.description: CPSQ: ROME IBS classification

variable.name: Q53ABDOMSYMPTOMS
variable.description: CPSQ Q53: Count of 10 IBS symptoms

variable.name: VVSCLASSIFICATION
variable.description: CPSQ: VVS case classification
